ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: THE FOUNDATION HAS A POLICY OF PRIMARILY MAKING GRANTS TO PROJECTS LOCATED IN THE ANGELINA COUNTY AREA. GRANTS ARE MADE ONLY TO A GOVERNMENTAL UNIT EXEMPT UNDER THE IRS CODE OR A NON-PROFIT, CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION HAVING AN EXEMPT LETTER FROM THE IRS EVIDENCING THAT IT IS SUCH AN ORGANIZATION.
